ComicInfo.Summary: Friendship to the Max Badge: Diana reveals she is really Artemis, the Greek goddess, and that the three-eyed monsters they've encountered are agents of Apollo. Apollo has been using the creatures to spy on Diana and trick the Lumberjanes into helping him to solve clues relating to a challenge. The girls, Jen, and Diana follow clues to the temple cave the girls found earlier, where the girls reveal they've already solved many of the challenges. Diana talks Jo into solving a final challenge to save her friends, and when she does Jo is turned to stone.
ComicInfo.Tags: April,Jo,Molly,Artemis,Apollo,Jen,Miss Quinzella Thiskwin Penniquiqul Thistle Crumpet's Camp for Hardcore Lady Types,Rosie,Mal,Ripley
ComicInfo.Title: Friendship to the Max Badge
